breedingPlanner.title: Breeding Planner
breedingPlanner.noResultsMessage: No suitable breeding pairs found for this trainee. Try adding more parents to your roster.
breedingPlanner.allSkillsCovered: This pair covers all {{count}} of your wishlist items!
breedingPlanner.allSkillsSaturated: All wishlisted skills are present in every defined ancestor.
breedingPlanner.noMissingSkills: No missing high-value (S/A rank) wishlist skills.
breedingPlanner.probAssumptionsText:
This is an estimate of the child's *individual score* (before grandparent bonuses) exceeding the weaker parent's. It is based on these assumptions:

- **Run Outcome:** An average of {{count}} white sparks are obtained per run.
- **Blue Sparks (1★/2★/3★):**
  - 1100+ Stats: 40% / 50% / 10%
  - 600-1099 Stats: 44% / 50% / 6%
- **Pink/White Sparks (1★/2★/3★):**
  - Below SS+ Rank: 50% / 45% / 5%
  - SS+ & Higher Rank: 20% / 70% / 10%
- **Unique Spark:** Not factored into this calculation as its outcome is fixed.
- **Model:** This is a statistical model and not a guarantee of in-game results.
breedingPlanner.disclaimerText: Probabilities are estimates based on game data and certain assumptions:
breedingPlanner.disclaimerScoreUpgrade: Score upgrade probability compares the child's potential individual score to the weaker parent's individual score.
breedingPlanner.disclaimerBlue: Blue spark probability is based on the target stats for all 5 blue factor types.
breedingPlanner.disclaimerPink: Pink spark probability assumes you have {{count}} A-rank aptitudes.
breedingPlanner.disclaimerWhite: White spark probability is based on the weighted average of all possible inheritable skills.
